Uses of Package
org.apache.shiro.spring

  • Packages that use org.apache.shiro.spring 
    Package Description
    org.apache.shiro.spring.boot.autoconfigure  
    org.apache.shiro.spring.config  
  • Classes in org.apache.shiro.spring used by org.apache.shiro.spring.boot.autoconfigure 
    Class and Description
    LifecycleBeanPostProcessor
    Bean post processor for Spring that automatically calls the init() and/or destroy() methods on Shiro objects that implement the Initializable or Destroyable interfaces, respectfully.
    ShiroEventBusBeanPostProcessor
    Spring BeanPostProcessor that detects, EventBusAware and classes containing @Subscribe methods.
  • Classes in org.apache.shiro.spring used by org.apache.shiro.spring.config 
    Class and Description
    LifecycleBeanPostProcessor
    Bean post processor for Spring that automatically calls the init() and/or destroy() methods on Shiro objects that implement the Initializable or Destroyable interfaces, respectfully.
    ShiroEventBusBeanPostProcessor
    Spring BeanPostProcessor that detects, EventBusAware and classes containing @Subscribe methods.
